Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not makers of history. We are made by history

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now

Quote.Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a son, who is my heart. A wonderful young man, daring and loving and strong and kind

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love

Quote.Author: Maya Angelou
Quote.QuoteValue: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: My heroes are and were my parents. I can't see having anyone else as my heroes

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, things may not go your way, but the effort should be there every single night

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come

Quote.Author: Michael Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought a role model should be negative

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Just try new things. Don't be afraid. Step out of your comfort zones and soar, all right?

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: There are still many causes worth sacrificing for, so much history yet to be made

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Choose people who lift you up

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own 'to do' list

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what it feels like to struggle to get the education that you need

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be somebody different to be important. You're important in your own right

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not be afraid to ask for help. Nobody gets through college on their own

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen firsthand that being president doesn't change who you are. It reveals who you are

Quote.Author: Michelle Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Find people who will make you better

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything worth doing is worth overdoing

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as my face is on page one, I don't care what they say about me on page seventeen

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all right letting yourself go, as long as you can get yourself back

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you for leaving us alone but giving us enough attention to boost our egos

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: My secrets must be poetic to be believable

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: People think they know you. They know the things about you that you have forgotten

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never wanted to give up performing on stage, but one day the tours will be over

Quote.Author: Mick Jagger
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very much against the secondary ticket market. I don't know anyone who isn't

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a girlfriend. But I do know a woman who'd be mad at me for saying that

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I wear a necklace, cause I wanna know when I'm upside down

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: If carrots got you drunk, rabbits would be messed-up

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: All these jokes have been pre-approved as funny by me

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Dogs are forever in the push up postion

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm against picketing, but I don't know how to show it

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: When someone hands you a flyer, it's like they're saying here you throw this away

Quote.Author: Mitch Hedberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could play little league now. I'd be way better than before

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace begins with a smile

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand

Quote.Author: Mother Teresa
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believed in myself

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: It isn't the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it's the pebble in your shoe

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in the religion of Islam. I believe in Allah and peace

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: My principles are more important than the money or my title

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Go up in an airplane. Go high enough, and it's like we don't even exist

Quote.Author: Muhammad Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: A leader is a dealer in hope

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wish to be a success in the world, promise everything, deliver nothing

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics stupidity is not a handicap

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a set of lies agreed upon

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind

Quote.Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote.QuoteValue: Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: A goal is a dream with a deadline

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: The starting point of all achievement is desire

Quote.Author: Napoleon Hill
Quote.QuoteValue: Money without brains is always dangerous

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to have fun. It's a beautiful life. You learn, you win, you lose, but you get up

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: I just enjoy life now. I just enjoy every morning I get to wake up

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you make it to your point of making it, you'll appreciate the struggle

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: The flaws, the mistakes I make - that's the real me

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go out unless I'm working. My quality time is when I'm doing nothing

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: Your look reflects what's happening in your mind. You gotta have some swag to you

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can be a rapper, but not anybody can be a classical artist

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get jealousy, I don't get how people hate each other - I never did

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: The sound of the '90s, to me, is a combination of soul and street - it's a feeling

Quote.Author: Nas
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the art world, I love art galleries, I love what it means - I love art

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Rational thoughts never drive people's creativity the way emotions do

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Science literacy is the artery through which the solutions of tomorrow's problems flow

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no greater education than one that is self-driven

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in the kind of society where, in almost all cases, hard work is rewarded

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone should have their mind blown once a day

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: The theory of evolution, like the theory of gravity, is a scientific fact

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is basically an inoculation against charlatans

Quote.Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I know of no time in human history where ignorance was better than knowledge

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish being a beekeeper, which I am, gave you a free pass on the carbon footprint, but it doesn't

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: Is the chemical aftertaste the reason why people eat hot dogs, or is it some kind of bonus?

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: Make good art

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the short story is a very underrated art form. We know that novels deserve respect

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the best way to learn something is by doing it wrong and looking at what you did

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: The imagination is a muscle. If it is not exercised, it atrophies

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: I kept starting 'Anansi Boys' as a movie and stopping, and eventually wrote the novel and was happy

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: The world always seems brighter when you've just made something that wasn't there before

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a fool's prerogative to utter truths that no one else will speak

Quote.Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock and roll stars have it much better than writers when they're on a tour

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: It always seems impossible until it's done

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as poverty, injustice and gross inequality persist in our world, none of us can truly rest

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: There can be no keener revelation of a society's soul than the way in which it treats its children

Quote.Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote.QuoteValue: Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The wise man does at once what the fool does finally

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The more sand has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics have no relation to morals

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It is much more secure to be feared than to be loved

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It is double pleasure to deceive the deceiver

Quote.Author: Niccolo Machiavelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Whosoever desires constant success must change his conduct with the times

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: Your victory is right around the corner. Never give up

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe your weird is my normal. Who's to say?

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm traveling, I'll pack socks in my bag - really cute furry ones

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind being called a weirdo

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want a wig that looks like a wig; I want one that could pass for a weave

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a child may be the only thing that could give me true happiness

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: You should never feel afraid to become a piece of art. It's exhilarating

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to Google myself

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole life is about being Nicki Minaj now. It's a never-ending saga

Quote.Author: Nicki Minaj
Quote.QuoteValue: Lavender is the new pink. I'll never stop wearing pink but I wanted to venture out

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: Every great story seems to begin with a snake

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the paparazzi might have chased me out of Los Angeles

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what it's like to meet someone you admire and have them be a complete jerk

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: Zoology has always been interesting to me. Nature is fascinating

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not afraid to play ugly - look at 'Adaptation.' I looked like a turd that a cat had coughed up

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't drink blood, and last time I looked in the mirror, I had a reflection

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: Shock is still fun. I won't ever shut the door on it

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: As a teenager I was more of an anarchist, but now I want people to thrive and be harmonious

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I jump around more when I'm alone

Quote.Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between the Method actor and the schizophrenic

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Colorless green ideas sleep furiously

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Wanton killing of innocent civilians is terrorism, not a war against terrorism

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Rational discussion is useful only when there is a significant base of shared assumptions

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If there was an observer on Mars, they would probably be amazed that we have survived this long

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: Any dictator would admire the uniformity and obedience of the U.S. media

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: You never need an argument against the use of violence, you need an argument for it

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a near miracle that nuclear war has so far been avoided

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: The elections are run by the same industries that sell toothpaste on television

Quote.Author: Noam Chomsky
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're teaching today what you were teaching five years ago, either the field is dead or you are

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: So we gravitated to shows and issues and causes that made people care

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the greater responsibility, in terms of morality, is where leadership begins

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: Originally, with all the shows, we went looking for belly laughs

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: In this nation, leadership is dollars

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: There was no real controversy with All In The Family. That came from the people on the business end

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody doubts my partisanship, but a lot of the activity is nonpartisan

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: When we went on the air, I didn't want to be interrupted for an act-one curtain

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: You're in the business - when you're a writer, producer, director - to get ratings

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: The American people may not be the best-educated, but they're very wise at heart

Quote.Author: Norman Lear
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when they don't know who Nixon was, these shows will continue to play

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: The early bird gets the worm. The early worm... gets eaten

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most feared expressions in modern times is 'The computer is down.'

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: If stock market experts were so expert, they would be buying stock, not selling advice

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: People do not win people fights. Lawyers do

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Bulls do not win bull fights. People do

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: Simple systems are not feasible because they require infinite testing

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: One should expect that the expected can be prevented, but the unexpected should have been expected

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: The optimum committee has no members

Quote.Author: Norman Ralph Augustine
Quote.QuoteValue: All too many consultants, when asked, 'What is 2 and 2?' respond, 'What do you have in mind?'

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not want to be a pawn in a political campaign

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: I do hunt, and I do fish, and I don't apologize to anybody for hunting and fishing

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: Going to war without France is like going hunting without an accordion

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: When placed in command, take charge

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: The fun of fishing is catching 'em, not killing 'em

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle

Quote.Author: Norman Schwarzkopf
Quote.QuoteValue: Any soldier worth his salt should be antiwar. And still there are things worth fighting for

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Change your thoughts and you change your world

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always too early to quit

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: We struggle with the complexities and avoid the simplicities

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with most of us is that we would rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a real magic in enthusiasm. It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination is the true magic carpet

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting people to like you is merely the other side of liking them

Quote.Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote.QuoteValue: Be interesting, be enthusiastic... and don't talk too much

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Gossip is what you say about the objects of flattery when they aren't present

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Russians not only vehemently despise blacks, they believe Africa begins at the Ukraine border

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: I like making things. I have a wood shop at home. I am a terrible carpenter but I love doing it

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Never wear anything that panics the cat

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Any terrorism is an attack on libertarian values

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Infant mortality and life expectancy are reasonable indicators of general well-being in a society

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: If government were a product, selling it would be illegal

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Because of their size, parents may be difficult to discipline properly

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: Never be unfaithful to a lover, except with your wife

Quote.Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is being run by irresponsible spoiled brats

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Every crowd has a silver lining

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune always favors the brave, and never helps a man who does not help himself

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Clowns are the pegs on which the circus is hung

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is the pursuit of pure truth, and the systematizing of it

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Medicine is the means by which we poor feeble creatures try to keep from dying or aching

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Witchcraft is one of the most baseless, absurd, disgusting and silly of all the humbugs

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Without promotion, something terrible happens... nothing!

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: He who is without a newspaper is cut off from his species

Quote.Author: P. T. Barnum
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics and government are certainly among the most important of practical human interests

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a long time to become young

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Colors, like features, follow the changes of the emotions

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Youth has no age

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Who sees the human face correctly: the photographer, the mirror, or the painter?

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything you can imagine is real

Quote.Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote.QuoteValue: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: As I grew up, one of my strongest allies has been my sister

Quote.Author: Patti Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My style says, 'Look at me, don't look at me.'
